TEXT.TITLE: HOME SAVINGS DURHAM <HSLD> SETS STOCK DIVIDEND
TEXT.BODY: Home Savings and Loan Association Inc of Durham, N.C., said its board declared a 20 pct stock dividend, payable April 28 to holders of record April Three. Reuter
